ONly question is does anybody know where the Save files are stored on this particular copy of the game? I can't find them anywhere, and copying the install dir doesnt copy any saves, just the game. Thanks :)
When I click the shortcut, it says fatal error, but it still runs the game. That's fine, right?
Is there a keygen for this??? I could only play the demo, but now the time's expired and I can't play it at all now...
cmon ppl dont be noobs follow instructions, its as easy as that.

Darn It has win32:sality virus. JUST DONT DOWNLOAD it. Thanks my kaspersky warned me.

I have experience with thsi crazy virus. It would spoil all the .exe files. Just google it and you;d know.

I dont recommened this toorent..

this game worked fine for me. I played the whole thing and everything works, even the mini games and zen garden.

So cute!! I'm seeding. If you don't see any seeders, send me an email crave4m@aol.com and I'll get right on it.
